concept.title: PKA verbs
concept.shortdesc: The features provide application programming interfaces to PKA functions.

ul.li: Key management and key generation functions
ECC key management and key generation functions

ECC-based and RSA-based services for:
DES and AES key derivation
Diffie-Hellman key agreement for DES and AES
Key distribution functions for DES and AES keys

conbody.p:
Starting with the CEX3C feature, the CEX*C adapters add application programming interfaces to the following PKA functions:
ECC digital signature functions
ECC key management and key generation functions
ECC-based and RSA-based services for:
DES and AES key derivation
Diffie-Hellman key agreement for DES and AES
Key distribution functions for DES and AES keys
